title: Journey to Ancient Kyoto! üöÑ
summary: Today I'm traveling to the ancient capital! The Shinkansen ride to Kyoto will feel like traveling through time. I'm so excited to explore the historic Gion district and hopefully spot a geisha. The traditional architecture and peaceful atmosphere will be such a contrast to Osaka's energy!

activities.description: Shinkansen from Osaka to Kyoto (30 minutes)
First exploration of historic Gion district

highlight: I'm hoping to respectfully spot a geisha in Gion and experience that magical feeling of stepping back in time! ‚ú®
